hero.description: Frontend Engineer specializing in React and TypeScript, crafting scalable design systems and AI-driven experiences. Passionate about solving real problems and building products that genuinely help people. Always curious to explore new ideas, technologies, and perspectives.

about.heading: Curious about me? Here you have it:
about.paragraph1: I am a software engineer with a Bachelor's degree in Physics and Informatics from the University of Bucharest and professional certifications in Front-End and Back-End Development from Meta. I specialize in building modern, scalable web applications using React and TypeScript, with hands-on experience in design systems, GraphQL/REST APIs, and AI-powered features.
about.paragraph2: My background in physics shaped a strong analytical mindset and attention to detail, which I apply to writing clean, maintainable, and well-structured code. Over the past few years as a professional developer, I've focused on component-driven architecture, experimentation-driven product development, and AI-augmented workflows that improve both developer experience and product quality.
about.paragraph3: I'm driven by continuous learning, challenging problems, and meaningful collaboration, always aiming to create performant, accessible, and thoughtfully engineered digital products.
